department: public works and government services canada
short_summary: "Electrical Service and Maintenance Standing Offer. Bidders are to provide electrical services on an as and when requested basis, with services to be performed on various Department of National Defence locations including but not limited to, CEEMFC, Camp Militaire de Nanaimo, Champ de tir militar de Nanaimo, and FIL1. Bidders are to provide electrical services up to a maximum value of $100,000 per individual call-up. Bidders are to hold a valid Facility Security Clearance at the level of SECRET, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).",subcontracting:
description: Electrical Service and Maintenance Standing Offer.
